subject: Support Request - This Version is Too Old to Use
description_text:
Hello, I get the following when using Simsonn Manager. I have an older set of Simsonn pedals from May 2024.
[cid:c6026a7a-682d-4710-8174-e7516b308eef]
Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi，Frothy Mammal，    In the firmware update section of Simsonn Manager, please manually select the plus.dfu  file from the pedals folder to perform the update.
